roleset.name: measure the speed of something
roleset.note: CLOCK-V NOTES: I doubt the "yardstick" argument will ever appear; it's largelysubsumed within the verb.For comparison, my laptop (PIII/750Mhz) runs at almost 1500 MIPs. (from clock.01-v)

example.name: with measurement
example.text: Intel clocks the chip's speed at 15 million instructions per second, or MIPs.
example.arg: at 15 million instructions per second , or MIPs

roleset.name: hit (on the head?)
roleset.note: CLOCK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'clock' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Framenet entry. Comparison with measure. (from clock.02-v predicate notes)

role.descr: instrument, thing hit by or with

example.name: whack!
example.text: We're going [*-2] to look for some of the better-known companies that[*T*-1]-3 got clocked [*-3]'' Friday.
